column4: I've been setting up file sharing using System->Administration->Shared Folders... I am sharing my home folder across a samba network with windows laptops.  This breezy server is showing in the workgroup on the windows machines but is asking for a password. I have tried entering my root and main username and password and it won't let me view the files. Preferably I wouldn't have a password because my LAN is secure.. any ideas please?.
you need to set up samba to allow guest authentication
You also need to use 'smbpasswd' to set the password for any user
it uses USERS from the system, but the passwords are separate, and need to be created via smbpasswd
